title: Peaceful Times (F02) Petit Film
synopsis: The short features previously unseen Evangelion storyboard art. Evangelion director Hideaki Anno supervised the "petit film," and Mahiro Maeda directed and storyboarded it. Shiro Sagisu provided the music, and voice actress Megumi Hayashibara narrates the Japanese version of the English lyrics.
staff: [['Maeda, Mahiro', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Higuchi, Shinji', ['Director']], ['Takahashi, Youko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Sagisu, Shirou', ['Music']]]
